playn.scene

Class RootLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.scene.Layer
      • playn.scene.ClippedLayer
        • playn.scene.GroupLayer
          • playn.scene.RootLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Iterable<Layer>, Closeable

    public class RootLayer
extends GroupLayer
    Serves as the root of the scene graph. This is just a GroupLayer with minor tweaks to ensure that when layers are added to it, they transition properly to the "added to scene graph" state.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class playn.scene.Layer

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface react.Closeable

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class playn.scene.Layer

        DEBUG_RECTS, state

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RootLayer()
      Creates an unclipped root layer.
      RootLayer(float width, float height)
      Creates a root layer clipped to the specified dimensions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RootLayer

        public RootLayer()
        Creates an unclipped root layer. This is almost always what you want.

      • RootLayer

        public RootLayer(float width,
